summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the corporation known as Southern Trust Company, Inc., which was formerly Financial Informatics, Inc. It confirms that the corporation filed Articles of Incorporation and is authorized to conduct business in the Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, who issued the certification of good standing for Southern Trust Company, Inc.

keyFacts: Southern Trust Company, Inc. was formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc.
The corporation filed Articles of Incorporation on November 18, 2011.
A Certificate of Incorporation was issued on December 8, 2011.
The corporation is considered to be in good standing as of the date of this certification.
